name: Game Collector (itch)
description:
Game Collector

You seem to have lost your games. Go look for them.

A silent narrative experience.

Controls:

Arrow Keys to move and interact

Story:

You play as a child who is in search of his games that he has lost around the house. But a dark secret also lies within this game. 

If you are into story rich content then this is the game for you. It has story based game play as well as features a couple of secrets/easter eggs.

Design Team:

Coding = Leon Lowe

Art = Leon Lowe
